Inscription

printed along one selvege, in black and orange: [A Vera DESIGN GOOD/DESIGN (in white on black circle inside orange square)]; printed on opposite selvedge, in black: [HAND PRINT \"STONE ON STONE\"]
title: Stone on Stone
